org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet

Class BasicRestServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.BasicRestServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, BasicJsonConfig, BasicRestOperations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomFeedResource, BasicRestServletGroup, ConfigResource, DebugResource, DirectoryResource, HelloWorldResource, JsonSchemaResource, PhotosResource, RrpcServlet, ShutdownResource

    public abstract class BasicRestServlet
extends RestServlet
implements BasicRestOperations, BasicJsonConfig
    Subclass of RestServlet with default settings and standard methods defined.

    Meant as a base class for top-level REST resources in servlet containers.

    Provides basic JSON support by implementing the BasicJsonConfig interface. Other language types can be added via the @Rest(serializers)/@Rest(parsers) annotations or by adding one of the predefined interfaces in org.apache.juneau.rest.config.

    Implements the basic REST endpoints defined in BasicRestOperations.

    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > @Rest-Annotated Classes
